title: Consumers who have purchased a meal from a food truck in the U.S. 2014 , by age
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Share of respondents, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly positive which exists from 18_to_34_years to 45_to_54_years.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 45_to_54_years to 65_years_and_over.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from All_adults to 18_to_34_years.
gold: This statistic shows the share of consumers who have purchased a meal from a food truck in the United States as of November 2014 , by age group . During the survey , 48 percent of respondents aged between 45 and 54 years said they had bought food from a food truck . In 2015 , the value of the food truck industry in the U.S. reached 856.7 million U.S. dollars .
